mapper.select: SELECT u.name AS reviewer_name, ri.image_url, rev.review_content, rev.is_verified_visit, rev.created_at, rev.helpful_count, u2.name AS reply_user_name, rr.replies_content FROM reviews rev JOIN restaurants r ON rev.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id JOIN users u ON rev.user_id = u.user_id JOIN review_images ri ON rev.review_id = ri.review_id LEFT JOIN review_replies rr ON rev.review_id = rr.review_id JOIN users u2 ON rr.user_id = u2.user_id WHERE rev.review_id = #{reviewId};

SELECT ri.image_url, rev.review_content, r.address, rev.created_at, u2.name, rr.replies_content, rr.created_at FROM reviews rev JOIN restaurants r ON rev.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id JOIN users u ON rev.user_id = u.user_id JOIN review_images ri ON rev.review_id = ri.review_id LEFT JOIN review_replies rr ON rev.review_id = rr.review_id JOIN users u2 ON rr.user_id = u2.user_id;

SELECT rev.review_id, u.name, rev.review_content, rev.created_at, r.name, rrt.report_id, rrt.reason, rrt.report_description, rrt.status FROM review_reports rrt JOIN reviews rev ON rev.review_id = rrt.review_id JOIN users u ON u.user_id = rev.user_id JOIN restaurants r ON r.restaurant_id = rev.restaurant_id;
